description: Accounts represent tenants or customers on the system. Each account represents an individual dataset or sandbox that only one tenant can access. The data set is architecturally independent from other tenants.

name.description: A friendly name for the account
The name to provide as the caller id

number.description: The number to provide as the caller id

reformat.description: A regular expression that if matched internal caller id numbers are replaced by

vm_to_email_template.description: The Voicemail To Email Template string

trunks.description: How many two-way trunks the account has

inbound_trunks.description: How many inbound-only trunks the account has
